wiki.content:
Unchain My Heart is a song written by Bobby Sharp and recorded first in 1961 by Trini Lopez and later by Ray Charles.   The song was a hit for Charles when released as a single in late 1963.   Accompanied by his Raelettes, Charles sang about wanting to be free from a woman "who won't let (him) go".
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Unchain My Heart is a song written by Bobby Sharp and recorded first in 1961 by Trini Lopez and later by Ray Charles.   The song was a hit for Charles when released as a single in late 1963.   Accompanied by his Raelettes, Charles sang about wanting to be free from a woman "who won't let (him) go".

name: Unchain My Heart
comments: the legend of ray charles r i p
not today, something good, but not "unchain my heart"! :-)

cocuklugumun hatta bebekligimin efsanesi!
televizyonda izlerken tam olarak kendime izah edemedigim nese kaynagi...
my favourite version of this song!
This song makes me want to get up and dance...
this is not unchain my heart..... another mislabel by last.fm
Unchain my heart... baby let me be....Unchain my heart....cause you don't care about me...
aretha or ray: what is the better interpretation?
Ray, always so edgy & smooth! You amaze.
